scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters to or from Ellen "Nellie" Key Howard Morgan or her cousin, John Hunt Morgan, both of Lexington, Kentucky; a list of investments held by Security Trust Co. for Charlton Hunt Morgan's children; instructions for filing Articles of Incorporation for foreign corporations in Kentucky; and two statements regarding business process agents. Letters between Nellie K. H. Morgan and T.J. Willison discuss Morgan's uncle, Confederate General John Hunt Morgan, and the book he is writing about General Morgan in attempt to correct currently published historical inaccuracies about him.
